bow: so incredibly furious at my mil setting the scene have bad genetic health condition that makes me quite frail and in mid december threw out my back badly first my husband took off time to help then my mom came up for week and then his mom who retired came up for over month all to help with my son and give me time to recover that was difficult to say the least but at least expected my son to be safe she insanely paranoid about everything you know the type always bundled up even if he sweating freaking out if he so much as touches power cord drove me nuts but trusted her and ve been giving my son this liquid yogurt stuff in sippy cup for some time now but learned an age ago it damned hard to clean if it goes even day without cleaning so had system had designated sippy cup for yogurt cleaned immediately after use sippy cup for juice little less stringently cleaned and the rest were water only if the juice or yogurt sippy cups could be found he just did get any when my back went out warned each of them in order hubby mom mil about the yogurt about how hard the sippy cups are to clean and how important it is to take the valve out *every time* in order to clean them they all agreed like was talking about the obvious so was satisfied ve not been able to clean the cups in months his mom gone and finally getting back on my feet my son and husband have been getting sick lot this last month but figured something was probably going around at his work ve only just gotten back to mine so late last night got up to soothe the little man during his nightly crying bouts and noticed his crib sippy cup was almost out of water so decided to refill him another one and swap out as was my usual practice from those months ago pulled off the lid and valve to check inside before filling it black mold omg next one the same forgive my yelling but *every sippy cup in the house had black mold in the valves* one of them had thick crust of yogurt inside the nipple slipped into his room and stole his sippy cup afraid of what see but hoping at least it was okay nope it had huge chunk of black in it that one was so thick it was colony full cm across almost broke down crying my husband likes to demonstrate to my son how to drink from the sippy cup to encourage him to drink more that must be why he been getting sick why my son been pretty much perpetually sick for month spent the next two hours nevermind that it was the middle of the night boiling and steaming the damned things trying to get rid of the black mold got one just *one* of seven of them satisfactorily cleaned but the rest hours of intensive work could get rid of the black stuff the valves are too small to clean out with brush sponse it soaking treatment rinsing only though resorted to chopsticks his stupid paranoid overprotective practically abusive she so obsessive and pushy mom she freaking blew me off she ignored my system and failed to clean the sippy cups despite my initial warning and later protests for instance she would keep the leftover yogurt in the sippy cup in the fridge for up to day to prevent food wastage whereas with me if he did finish it within an hour it was dumped and cleaned we had talk about that and she *promised* me that she was being very careful to clean them thinking of dumping all the damned sippy cups and replacing them entirely do know if can trust them after being that slime encrusted and hard to clean know you guys will know my pain just thought share glad his mom not staying with us right now because getting arrested for first degree murder would probably not help our situation **tl dr** my mil ignored my warnings about how critically important it is to clean the sippy cups before they get hard to clean while they were up here helping me recover from back injury three months later discover black mold in all of my son sippy cups edit for note while my husband did admittedly fail to closely examine the nozzles and valves he did resume the system and did resume cleaning out the sippy cups after every use if they had already been thick with mold so thick that soak and rinse apparently does nothing there would be no problem **edit** the original post also added my mother in the blame but really have no reason to believe she was responsible at all she left as soon as my mil arrived about weeks ago and the boys did start getting sick till about week after my mil got here oh my goodness would be livid think it definitely time for some new cups ca believe how some people can be so dense know and she been so concerned about my son cough he started coughing about week after she arrived and did stop the whole time she remained still is coughing she was convinced it was because would bundle him up as much as her the doctors thought it was lingering cold or nasal drip since his lungs sounded fine my husband he started coughing up blood though only drop or so we thought maybe there was mold in the walls but could figure out why was getting sick but now it obvious do drink from the sippy cups that soo scary think you should tell your doctor immediately definitely get the mold tested it dangerous good idea on the you got some replacements be pissed too glad your hubbie is on your side about it though be pissed too not to downplay that at all but here some food for thought or few thoughts about food you probably be happier not knowing *aspergillus niger niger translating directly to black is very common fungus used in food processing and fermenting some yogurts are made with niger as fermenting agent but even if another fermenting agent is used if your yogurt contains citric acid or fructose or was made in facility where other yogurts are made it almost certainly contaminated with niger deliberately or accidentally when you see citric acid on the ingredients list of food guess where that comes from hint it not from lemons there are lots of black or blackish molds in the world but when it comes to food it usually this one behind anything distinctly black it grows fast and dominates most other fungi in mixed population which is actually good thing unlike many other possible contaminants it is generally recognized as safe to eat drink gras is an actual fda label although it not healthy to inhale in high concentrations and some people have an allergic reaction to it on the flip side of that coin niger is being researched as potential treatment for certain digestive diseases due to its ability to out populate potentially harmful gut bacteria while drinking nasty mold is decidedly unappetizing it not necessarily harmful and it not likely the reason your son and husband have been coughing unless there some other source of it in your house where it dry abundant and becoming airborne or they re having an allergic reaction both possible but unlikely even if this is some completely different mold coughing is pretty specific immune response to *respiratory* irritation inflammation congestion etc so that probably something else too if had dollar for every cold and flu my husband and kids have shared that have miraculously avoided well have 20 or so not much when you look at it that way but happy to have dodged those bullets oh and few drops of blood happens with plain old coughing more than we realize though her son and husband were getting sick so clearly this was not an everday mold until doctor makes determination we have no idea it was the mold causing them to get sick yup same thing happened to us with our daycare we often swapped around sippy cups and every single one that ever opened with one of those stupid rubber valves had black on it it was gross and always took care of it when found it but that mold is really hurting anyone unless they already have an extremely weak immune system actually found it in the crevices of my tea pitcher recently the part where the tea pours over to get out of the jug no telling how long it had been there drink several glasses from that pitcher day feel fine so it not the yogurt and it highly unlikely that it made anyone sick your mother in law and your husband screwed up but when you consider your reaction to her keep three things in mind to screw up is human sure that you make mistakes in your parenting and doubt that you would want husband pediatrician etc to call you stupid
